article_title: Trump: Obama Has Done Nothing for Blacks, I Would Win Their Vote
article_text:
Here’s another interesting clip from Donald Trump‘s phoned-in appearance on ABC This Week.

Mediaite presents: In which Donald Trump declares that President Barack Obama has done “absolutely nothing” for the black community and, more importantly, Donald Trump “would win the African-American vote.”

Watch below, via ABC:

Please enable Javascript to watch.

[Image via ABC/screengrab]

— —
